title: Online Instructional Design-Based Training for Advanced Negotiation Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment for strengthening negotiation competencies of science field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to develop strategies applying instructional design principles (ADDIE model) in real negotiation scenarios
Learners apply integrative conflict management styles with 80% or higher accuracy to practical negotiation situations
Learners will apply the acquired negotiation skills in real work settings at least twice within four weeks after completing the course
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
